metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1464 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: RT (aka Request Tracker) before 4.0.23 and 4.2.x before 4.2.10 allows remote attackers to hijack sessions via an RSS feed URL.

criterions.comment: request-tracker4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
